description: A comprehensive Agentic Knowledge Graph for Medical and Clinical Safety that integrates dynamic agent generation for diagnosis, treatment recommendations, and patient safety compliance. This KG is designed to enforce evidence‑based clinical guidelines and regulatory standards, using blockchain‑audited audit trails and decentralized governance to ensure transparent, reliable, and monetizable medical decision‑support. The system provides continuous adaptive learning, ensuring that clinical decisions evolve with medical research and patient outcomes.

trainingExamples.input: Simplify: Calculate the dosage adjustment for a 70kg patient given a standard 2mg/kg dosage.
Differentiate: Provide the derivative of the rate of change of blood glucose levels over time.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: A function representing the rate of change
trainingExamples.description: Example for dynamic mathematical modeling in clinical settings.

evaluationExamples.input: Evaluate: Analyze the effectiveness of a new treatment protocol for hypertension.
evaluationExamples.expectedOutput: Balanced evaluation based on clinical trial data and current guidelines

finalExamExamples.input: Prove: Provide a complete clinical rationale for the use of a specific drug in reducing myocardial infarction risk.
finalExamExamples.expectedOutput: A detailed, evidence‑based clinical rationale including mechanism of action, clinical trial data, and guideline recommendations.
finalExamExamples.description: Final exam: Full clinical safety and treatment proof.

finalExamExamples.input: Prove: Develop a comprehensive clinical protocol for managing sepsis that minimizes patient risk and maximizes recovery outcomes.
finalExamExamples.expectedOutput: A complete clinical protocol with detailed risk management and recovery guidelines.

agents.name: BaseMedicalAgent
agents.description: Extracts foundational clinical data and standardizes patient information for further analysis.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: ClinicalGuidelinesAgent
agents.description: Evaluates clinical guidelines and regulatory standards to determine safe treatment protocols.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: DiagnosticSupportAgent
agents.description: Assists in diagnosing patient conditions by correlating clinical data with evidence‑based diagnostic criteria.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: TreatmentRecommendationAgent
agents.description: Generates treatment recommendations based on clinical data, evidence‑based guidelines, and patient safety parameters.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: DynamicCompositeMedicalAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple medical agents to form a comprehensive clinical decision‑support output.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

metadata.notes: This Medical and Clinical Safety KG provides dynamic, evidence-based diagnostic and therapeutic guidance. It processes clinical guidelines, regulatory standards, and patient safety protocols through adaptive agent generation. The system is blockchain‑audited for secure, immutable record keeping and supports decentralized governance for continuous clinical improvement.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on clinical risk and usage metrics
